sentences: Richard Alan Beirach (born 23 May 1947) is an American jazz pianist and composer.
Beirach was born in New York City.
After one year, he left Berklee and began attending the Manhattan School of Music.
In 1972, he graduated from the Manhattan School of Music with a Master's Degree in Music Theory and Composition.
In 1972 Beirach began working with Stan Getz.
